transform_def.name: designed33
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan(abs(p_in.x) + abs(p_in.y)) t = tan(abs(p_in.x + p_in.y) + abs(p_in.x - p_in.y)) u = lerp(s, t, 0.5) v = tan(lerp(tan(length(p_in)), u, 0.5)) w = tan(s * t) z = lerp(v, w, 0.5) * (r * halfpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
